summary: Hydraulic ram pump using hydraulic pressure to raise clean water.

eligible.eligibleBullet02: use hydraulic pressure to raise clean water - systems using electric pumps are not eligible
eligible.eligibleBullet03: have a 20L per minute flow at a 3m head
eligible.eligibleBullet10: have a header tank with minimum 5000L capacity
